sections.content: My name is Pine. I'm a CS undergrad at UC berkeley and my interests are in backend systems and infrastructure. I like to solve difficult problems with great people.

To see more of what I'm up to, you can check out my
[GitHub](https://github.com/PineND) or [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/pine-ng). Say hi to me at pinenguyen [at] berkeley [dot] edu.
Below are some of the things I've been up to.

rows.description: Software Engineer Intern @ [Primer](https://www.primer.com), working on their education OS. Backed by Founders Fund, Khosla Ventures, Sam Altman, etc.
Undergraduate at the University of California - Berkeley, Computer Science major.

Led a team of engineers to build the Catalog, Grades, and Enrollment page at [Berkeleytime](https://berkeleytime.com). Prior, I built the crowd-sourced data system, and contributed to the semantic search engine.
Software Engineer Intern @ [GlobalFoundries](https://www.gf.com). Built the semiconductor tapeout validation platform, and the anti-tampering infrastructure.
